mapper.select: SELECT store_id, store_name, store_img, store_score, category_name, location_name FROM ( SELECT store_id, store_name, store_img, store_score, category_id, location_id FROM tbl_store ORDER BY store_name LIMIT #{firstIndex}, #{rowsPerPage}) s, tbl_category c, tbl_location l WHERE s.category_id = c.category_id AND s.location_id = l.location_id ORDER BY store_name

SELECT store_id, store_name, store_img, s.category_id, category_name, s.location_id, location_name FROM tbl_store s, tbl_category c, tbl_location l WHERE store_id = #{storeId} AND s.category_id = c.category_id AND s.location_id = l.location_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_store (store_id, store_name, store_img, store_score, category_id, location_id) VALUES (#{storeId}, #{storeName}, #{storeImg}, 0.0, #{categoryId}, #{locationId})
